page.title: 11FARMING
page.content:
THE TYPE OF FARMING FOUND IN AN AREA DEPENDS ON THE CLIMATE, THE SOIL AND THE RELIEF OF THE LAND. IN THIS AREA OF TEESSIDE THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF MONTHS A YEAR WITH A TEMPERATURE OF MORE THAN 6 C (THE MINIMUM FOR GROWTH), IS 6.8. THIS MAKES ARABLE FARMING SUITABLE BECAUSE THERE IS A LONG GROWING SEASON. THE AVERAGE NUMBER OF HOURS OF SUNSHINE IS 5.5 hrs A DAY. THIS MAKES ARABLE FARMING EVEN MORE SUITABLE BECAUSE THE CROPS WILL RIPEN EASILY. THE AMOUNT OF RAIN FOR A YEAR IS 750mm WHICH IS GOOD FOR BARLEY AND RAPE BUT TOO MUCH FOR WHEAT.
